import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; const Overview = () => { const principles = [ { icon: ( ), title: 'Curiosity Over Dogma', description: 'We believe in the power of questions, not the comfort of fixed answers. All beliefs are welcome, but all are open to gentle inquiry.' }, { icon: ( ), title: 'Respectful Dialogue', description: 'Our greatest insights come from sharing diverse perspectives. We are committed to listening with empathy and speaking with kindness.' }, { icon: ( ), title: 'Integrated Wisdom', description: 'We value both objective data and subjective experience. Our goal is to weave together insights from science and spirituality into a richer worldview.' }, { icon: ( ), title: 'Community Foundation', description: 'Our work is done together. The club is a space for connection, friendship, and mutual support on our individual and collective journeys.' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Our Story & Purpose

Understanding the 'why' behind the SNS Clubâ€”a community dedicated to exploring the universe, within and without.

{/* The Genesis of the Club */}

The Spark of an Idea

"For years, I felt a strange division in my life. By day, I was immersed in the world of logic, data, and empirical evidence. By night, I would look up at the Kattangal sky and feel a sense of awe that science alone couldn't fully capture. I read philosophy, I practiced meditation, and I realized I was leading two parallel lives that rarely intersected."

"The spark for the SNS Club came from a simple, powerful question: 'What if these two paths are not separate?' What if the awe I feel looking at a galaxy through a telescope is the same fundamental human experience as the peace I feel in quiet meditation? What if the scientist's relentless search for truth and the mystic's journey toward understanding are just different dialects of the same language?"

"I founded this club not to find definitive answers, but to create a home for that question. It is a space for all of us who suspect that the deepest truths lie at the intersection of our most rigorous questions and our most profound experiences."

- [Your Name], Founder

{/* Our Core Philosophy */}

Our Guiding Principles

{principles.map((principle, index) => (
{principle.icon}

{principle.title}

{principle.description}

))}
{/* Meet the Founder */}

A Note from Our Founder

"My role here is not as a teacher, but as a fellow traveler and a humble host. My passion is simply to hold the space for these vital conversations to happen. I am so glad you've found your way here, and I look forward to walking this path of inquiry with you."

- [Your Name]

{/* Join Us CTA */}

Become Part of Our Story

If this story resonates with you, we invite you to join our community. Attend an event, join a discussion, and add your voice to the conversation.

Explore Our Events
); }; export default Overview;
